forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain will fall throughout the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
